sailpoint.rapidsetup.plan

Class BasePlanBuilder<T extends BasePlanBuilder>

  • java.lang.Object
    • sailpoint.rapidsetup.plan.BasePlanBuilder<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LeaverPlanBuilder

    public class BasePlanBuilder<T extends BasePlanBuilder>
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for Joiner, Mover and Leaver plan builders.

      • joinerPlan

        public static sailpoint.rapidsetup.plan.JoinerPlanBuilder joinerPlan(SailPointContext context,
                                                                     java.lang.String identityName,
                                                                     java.util.List<RoleAssignment> birthrightRoleAssignments)
        Utility method that creates new instance of JoinerPlanBuilder within given context for identity with specified identity name.
        Parameters:
        context - SailPointContext that provides an API to access persistence store and core system operations
        identityName - the name of identity to lookup from context
        birthrightRoleAssignments - list of RoleAssignments to build role assignment account request from
        Returns:
        new JoinerPlanBuilder instance.

                                                                   java.util.List<RoleAssignment> birthrightRoleAssignments)

      • leaverPlan

        public static LeaverPlanBuilder leaverPlan(SailPointContext context,
                                           java.lang.String identityName,
                                           java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> additionalArgs,
                                           LeaverAppConfigProvider appConfigProvider,
                                           boolean isTerminateIdentity)
        Utility method that creates new instance of LeaverPlanBuilder within given context for identity with specified identity name.
        Parameters:
        context - SailPointContext that provides an API to access persistence store and core system operations
        identityName - the name of identity to lookup from context
        additionalArgs - Map that may contain such attributes keys like "reasonComments", "requestType" etc., used when building plan or deferred plans, processing apps, getting app requests
        appConfigProvider - LeaverAppConfigProvider used to check various opts when building leave link requests, work with entitlement exception filters, passwords, getting app requests, moving accounts, adding requests from rules
        isTerminateIdentity - boolean flag that defines which configuration to use when creating requests to remove role: for leaver or for termination.
        Returns:
        new LeaverPlanBuilder instance.

      • initProvisioningPlan

        protected ProvisioningPlan initProvisioningPlan(Identity identity,
                                                java.lang.String comments)
        Convenience method to create a fresh ProvisioningPlan.
        Parameters:
        identity - the identity to set on the plan
        comments - the comments to set on the plan
        Returns:
        the new ProvisioningPlan

      • buildRoleAssignmentAccountRequest

        protected ProvisioningPlan.AccountRequest buildRoleAssignmentAccountRequest(Identity identity,
                                                                            RoleAssignment roleAssignment)
        Create an AccountRequest to assign the role to the identity.
        Parameters:
        identity - the Identity to which the role should be assigned
        roleAssignment - the role which needs assigned to the identity
        Returns:
        a new AccountRequest to assign the role to the identity

      • buildCreateAccountRequest

        protected ProvisioningPlan.AccountRequest buildCreateAccountRequest(SailPointContext context,
                                                                    java.lang.String appName,
                                                                    Identity identity)
                                                             throws GeneralException
        Create an AccountRequest appropriate to provision a bare account on the application for the identity.
        Parameters:
        context - SailPointContext that provides an API to access persistence store and core system operations
        appName - the application to create a bare account on
        identity - the identity to create a bare account
        Returns:
        a new AccountRequest to create a bare account for the identity on the app
        Throws:
        GeneralException

        protected java.util.List<Bundle> getAssignedBirthrightRoles(SailPointContext context,
                                                            java.lang.String identityName)
                                                     throws GeneralException
        Creates a list of existing birthright assigned roles for given identity.
        Parameters:
        context - SailPointContext that provides an API to access persistence store and core system operations
        identityName - the name of identity to lookup from context
        Returns:
        List of Bundles of assigned birthright roles
        Throws:
        GeneralException - may occur when getting object by name from context e.g. when more that one result is returned

      • filterBirthrightRolesAlreadyAssigned

        protected java.util.List<RoleAssignment> filterBirthrightRolesAlreadyAssigned(SailPointContext context,
                                                                              java.lang.String identityName,
                                                                              java.util.List<RoleAssignment> allBirthrightRoleAssignments)
                                                                       throws GeneralException
        Create a list of RoleAssignments that are not previously assigned to an identity based on a list of RoleAssignments passed in to check against.
        Parameters:
        context - SailPointContext that provides an API to access persistence store and core system operations
        identityName - name of the identity to check for previously assigned birthright roles
        allBirthrightRoleAssignments - list of all birthright roles to check against being previously assigned
        Returns:
        a List of RoleAssignments that are not previously assigned to an identity
        Throws:
        GeneralException

                                                                          Bundle roleToRemove)
        Build Joiner Roles Remove Account Request.
        Parameters:
        identityName - used to create new Account Request
        roleToRemove - specifies the role to be removed

      • generateSetAttributeRequest

        public static ProvisioningPlan.AttributeRequest generateSetAttributeRequest(java.lang.String attrName,
                                                                            java.lang.String attrValue)
        Construct an AttributeRequest that will update the given attribute to the given value.
        Parameters:
        attrName - the name of the attribute to update
        attrValue - the value to update the attribute to
        Returns:
        ProvisioningPlan.AttributeRequest to set the given attribute to the given value

      • encryptSecrets

        public void encryptSecrets(SailPointContext context,
                           ProvisioningPlan plan)
                    throws GeneralException
        Walk over a plan looking for AttributeRequests for sensitive attributes like passwords and encrypt the values. This will ensure that the passwords are encrypted so they won't appear in workflow trace. This transformation will be undone immediately before passing the plan to the Connector.
        Throws:
        GeneralException
